item.description:
Join us for a potluck dinner at Avril de la Cretaz's house in South Amherst.  We'll celebrate the new year with a potluck dinner en francais and a Galette des Rois cake just like in France.  Do you know this very old French tradition?  The cake is delicious and if you are the lucky one who finds the "feve" inside you'll be the King or Queen of the dinner. 

See you then!

Romy
item.how_to_find_us: Directions to Avril's house will be sent to you when you RSVP
item.name: Galette des Rois Potluck Dinner
